name: Hilton Garden Inn Portland/Lake Oswego

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While I like all 3 HGI's in the Portland area, this is my favorite because of location, staff, and service. I've stayed here many times over the years and it's still excellent.
reviews.title: The Best HGI in Portland area

reviews.title: Close to a lot of things

reviews.text: We have stayed at this hotel many times on our travels. The staff is always very helpful and the rooms clean and comfortable. This time was as good as the last. I'll be back.
reviews.title: Good Place to Overnight in Portland

reviews.text: Stayed at this location for business. Rooms were clean. Great location for eating, shopping, etc. No concerns. Would consider bringing family
reviews.title: Positive Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a stay at this hotel. We loved it. Will definitely stay there the next time we go to Portland. It was easy to get to off of the freeway. The staff were all friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Rooms were clean and comfortable and quiet. The beds can actually be adjusted to your liking, which is a plus. Breakfast was included in our price, and it was very good. Staff again were great - attentive, but not hovering. There is a bar in the evenings if you wish to have a drink and perhaps watch TV on the large one in the lobby. Lots of restaurants in the immediate area to choose from. Didnt use the pool or fitness area, but they look pretty good.
reviews.title: We loved it and will be back

reviews.text: We've stayed here probably a dozen times over the last five years, sometimes by ourselves and sometimes with friends or family. Most recently, roughly March of this year, that was for a couple of day stay with friends from the East coast.
reviews.title: Reliably Good Place to Stay

reviews.text: Everything went smoothly here, from the room I requested to the shuttle service requests I had made, the hot breakfast was very good....I cannot complain about anything at all....how unusual it is to find everything to be just the way you expected it to be, and have staff that is very professional and caring.
reviews.title: staff extremely accomodating, room perfect

reviews.text: This property is a good, with an excellent and attentive staff. Located next to freeway, and popular with groups and teams, apparently. Nice bed, nice amenities, and overall very good experience.
reviews.title: A lot to like

reviews.text: Hot breakfast (including made to order omlettes) may be included in your rate.
reviews.title: Less than 10 Hours

reviews.text: Arrived around 10pm and left by 8 am the next morning. Standard HGI, comfortable, clean, good nights rest. Restaurant on-site, free parking, good internet. What I have come to expect from HGI.
reviews.title: Good hotel for large groups

reviews.text: clean, friendly, lots of covered parking. Amenable to large groups- great breakfast for hungry soccer players. Trails nearby for walking.
reviews.title: Excellent weekend stay!

reviews.text: Stayed for 3 days. Breakfast is nice if included. If not, it is $10.00. Rooms were somewhat small but everything worked great. Very nice workout room but rather small pool. The staff we so great. Made sure we had the room we wanted. Also, the servers at breakfast were terrific. Ordering was easy and they really were great!
reviews.title: Great location with helpful, friendly staff

reviews.text: Great staff...friendly, helpful. The room air conditioning is so loud it's difficult to sleep. The rooms are long, long over due for refurbishing. The elevators rank as the slowest on the planet. In fact, one of the two elevators was not operating during our four-day stay.
reviews.title: Needs Update....Now

reviews.text: We stayed a night at this hotel and ended up staying here for our anniversary and mini weekend trip to Portland with our family and friends. So easy and off the freeway and the rooms are a little on the small side but very nice and clean. It's always a necessity to have a microwave and mini fridge with our group. The staff were very friendly and helpful. My daughter was having difficulty connecting to the free internet and the young man was so helpful to make sure she could get connected. They also have a wine and beer hour in the evening for the adults. My favorite part has to be the bed and the nice tv. The bed was similar to a sleep number type of bed....I slept so well and it has been a very long time that I had a good restful slumber. The other thing I also liked was how fast the AC cooled down the room on a toasty day. The adults and kids also enjoyed the pool! A little on the small side but it was just our group so it was perfect.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and location...enjoyable stay.

reviews.text: Located in an upscale neighborhood. Restaurants around. Not more than 15 minutes to downtown. Very close to a major mall (Washington Square). Numerous urgent care medical facilties around. Full breakfast for $9.99. Nice, clean rooms, with refrigerator and microwave oven. Great staff. Lots of parking space. I stay here every month.
reviews.title: Modern, very clean, business hotel

reviews.text: My daughter, granddaughter, and I booked a room at the Hilton Garden, Lake Oswego to be close to family for the weekend. I live in Eugene, so not that far away, but wanted to be close to Portland for the weekend. I was delighted to find a deal on Groupon for a hotel in the area we needed to stay so bought it. I’m writing this review as I sit in my room at the hotel the second night of our stay.
reviews.title: Poor Service

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Portland/Lake Oswego Hotel
description: A relaxing Lake Oswego hotel, the Hilton Garden Inn Portland/Lake Oswego hotel is conveniently located near Tigard & Wilsonville, OR within close proximity to the beautiful Oregon Wine Country and only minutes from downtown Portland. We are also located near Bridgeport Village Shopping Mall, Washington Square Shopping Mall, Oregon Zoo, Rose Garden Arena, and Lewis and Clark College. Plus, the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Lake Oswego offers 179 spacious guestrooms full of thoughtful amenities complemented by friendly service and a relaxed atmosphere. At the Hilton Garden Inn, you'll find everything you need, right where you need it during your stay in Oregon.
